scenario.data.wandering_paladin.name: Wandering Paladin
scenario.data.wandering_paladin.descript: You are on your personal crusade to rid the land of the spawns that came from the Conjunction of the Planes.
scenario.data.wandering_paladin.win.0: <style="status">Explore</style> and <style="status">Battle</style> until you don't want to anymore.
